newsitem.title: USA: Fed adds reserves via over-the-weekeend system RPs.
newsitem.headline: Fed adds reserves via over-the-weekeend system RPs.

text.p: The Federal Reserve added reserves to the banking system on Friday via over-the-weekend system repurchase agreements, the New York Fed confirmed.
The operation was expected by the bond market.

Fed funds were trading at 5-3/4 percent at the time of the operation, above the Fed's 5-1/2 percent target. Analysts cited the settlement of last week's Treasury refunding auctions as contributing to the tight funds rate.
